TEXT.English: The unit has become devoted to a loathsome and macabre food found only in the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.French: The unit has become devoted to a loathsome and macabre food found only in the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.German: Die Einheit wurde abhängig von einer widerlichen und makabren Nahrung, die nur in Heimgesuchten Landen existiert.
TEXT.Italian: The unit has become devoted to a loathsome and macabre food found only in the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.Spanish: The unit has become devoted to a loathsome and macabre food found only in the Haunted Lands.

TEXT.English: They've seen things too terrible to comprehend, too terrible to forget.
TEXT.French: They've seen things too terrible to comprehend, too terrible to forget.
TEXT.German: Sie haben Dinge gesehen ... zu schrecklich, sie zu verstehen, zu schrecklich, sie zu vergessen.
TEXT.Italian: They've seen things too terrible to comprehend, too terrible to forget.
TEXT.Spanish: They've seen things too terrible to comprehend, too terrible to forget.

TEXT.English: Can't sleep, can't eat, can't go back, can't go forward. Removed away from the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.French: Can't sleep, can't eat, can't go back, can't go forward. Removed away from the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.German: Kann nicht schlafen, nicht essen, keinen Schritt vor, keinen zurück. Entfernt nach Verlassen der Heimgesuchten Lande.
TEXT.Italian: Can't sleep, can't eat, can't go back, can't go forward. Removed away from the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.Spanish: Can't sleep, can't eat, can't go back, can't go forward. Removed away from the Haunted Lands.

TEXT.English: Under assault by weird manifestations of the twisted land itself. Removed away from the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.French: Under assault by weird manifestations of the twisted land itself. Removed away from the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.German: Unter des Einflusses seltsamer Manifestionen des pervertierten Landes selbst. Nach Verlassen der Heimgesuchten Lande entfernt.
TEXT.Italian: Under assault by weird manifestations of the twisted land itself. Removed away from the Haunted Lands.
TEXT.Spanish: Under assault by weird manifestations of the twisted land itself. Removed away from the Haunted Lands.

TEXT.English: The Horned Dread is the face of terror. There is no such thing as Courage. The unit may not attack.
TEXT.French: The Horned Dread is the face of terror. There is no such thing as Courage. The unit may not attack.
TEXT.German: Der Gehörnte Schrecken ist das Gesicht des Horrors. So eine Sache wie Taperkeit existiert überhaupt nicht. Die Einheit kann nicht angreifen.
TEXT.Italian: The Horned Dread is the face of terror. There is no such thing as Courage. The unit may not attack.
TEXT.Spanish: The Horned Dread is the face of terror. There is no such thing as Courage. The unit may not attack.

TEXT.English: Victims become incable of attack, and sometimes even movement.
TEXT.French: Victims become incable of attack, and sometimes even movement.
TEXT.German: Opfer sind nicht fähig zum Angriff, manchmal nicht einmal mehr zur Bewegung.
TEXT.Italian: Victims become incable of attack, and sometimes even movement.
TEXT.Spanish: Victims become incable of attack, and sometimes even movement.

TEXT.English: "It's not like there were even any other trees around. But... but suddenly it was just THERE, right in front of us. It was like everything seemed to bend around it. The sky, my... my... my mind. I'm not ashamed to say I ran. I'm not! Everyone did. You can't kill us all just for running. Not from that thing." - Unnamed soldiers's account just before the Judicar of Vallus Massacre.

TEXT.French: Manifest the Horned Dread though this Ghostwalker. Removes Horned Dread from currently manifesting unit.
TEXT.German: Manifestierung des Gehörnten Schreckens durch diesen Geistwandler. Entfernt den Gehörnten Schrecken von der momentanen damit behafteten Einheit.
TEXT.Italian: Manifest the Horned Dread though this Ghostwalker. Removes Horned Dread from currently manifesting unit.
TEXT.Spanish: Manifest the Horned Dread though this Ghostwalker. Removes Horned Dread from currently manifesting unit.

TEXT.English: Upgrade unit to Horned Dread. After this Ghostwalkers may Manifest the Horned Dread without cost so long as there's another Ghostwalker the Horned Dread can ride.
TEXT.French: Upgrades unit to Horned Dread. After this Ghostwalkers may Manifest the Horned Dread without cost so long as there's another Ghostwalker the Horned Dread can ride.
TEXT.German: Wertet die Einheit zum Gehörnten Schrecken auf. Danach kann dieser Geistergänger Gehörnte Schrecken kostenlos manifestieren, wenn ein anderer Geistergänger anwesend ist, von dem der Gehörnte Schrecken Besitz ergreifen kann.

TEXT.English: Current incarnation of the Horned Dread
TEXT.French: Current incarnation of the Horned Dread
TEXT.Italian: Current incarnation of the Horned Dread
TEXT.Spanish: Current incarnation of the Horned Dread

TEXT.English: An incarnation of the Haunted Lands, the Horned Dread is a powerful fighter so strange and terrifying that not even units with Courage always stand against it.[PARAGRAPH:2]The Horned Dread may manifest in any sufficiently powerful Ghostwalker (level 6+) once Animal Mastery has been researched. Once thus released any Ghostwalker may play host, gainting the Horned Dread's power even as it leaves the previous Ghostwalker. So long as there's another Ghostwalker the Horned Dread may easily take shape. However, should all Ghostwalkers be killed a new bond must be forged between the Haunted Land and another level 6+ Ghostwalker.

TEXT.English: Burrowing in, then growing - runners winding around vein and nerve - and finally the gory harvest.
TEXT.French: Burrowing in, then growing - runners winding around vein and nerve - and finally the gory harvest.
TEXT.German: Eingraben, dann wachsen - Triebe winden sich um Ader und Nerv - und schließlich die bluttriefende Ernte.
TEXT.Italian: Burrowing in, then growing - runners winding around vein and nerve - and finally the gory harvest.
TEXT.Spanish: Burrowing in, then growing - runners winding around vein and nerve - and finally the gory harvest.

TEXT.English: Some accepted the Gift before the battle, and are now Reborn.
TEXT.French: Some accepted the Gift before the battle, and are now Reborn.
TEXT.German: Manche haben die Gabe vor der Schlacht erhalten und ... sind nun wiedergeboren.
TEXT.Italian: Some accepted the Gift before the battle, and are now Reborn.
TEXT.Spanish: Some accepted the Gift before the battle, and are now Reborn.

TEXT.English: Rather than fight to the death a unit has accepted the Gift.
TEXT.French: Rather than fight to the death a unit has accepted the Gift.
TEXT.German: Anstatt erst bis zum Tod zu kömpfen, hat eine Einheit schon vorher die Gabe angenommen.
TEXT.Italian: Rather than fight to the death a unit has accepted the Gift.
TEXT.Spanish: Rather than fight to the death a unit has accepted the Gift.

TEXT.English: The merciful Emperor offers his Gift to the worthy citizens of this city.
TEXT.French: The merciful Emperor offers his Gift to the worthy citizens of this city.
TEXT.German: Der gnädige Imperator hat seine Gabe den würdigen Bürgern dieser Stadt angeboten.
TEXT.Italian: The merciful Emperor offers his Gift to the worthy citizens of this city.
TEXT.Spanish: The merciful Emperor offers his Gift to the worthy citizens of this city.

TEXT.English: Functining like an invisible curse, some Weird Wrack victims are far more unlucky than others.
TEXT.French: Functining like an invisible curse, some Weird Wrack victims are far more unlucky than others.
TEXT.German: Wie bei einem unsichtbaren Fluch sind manche Opfer des Gruseligen Tangs viel schlimmer dran als andere.
TEXT.Italian: Functining like an invisible curse, some Weird Wrack victims are far more unlucky than others.
TEXT.Spanish: Functining like an invisible curse, some Weird Wrack victims are far more unlucky than others.

TEXT.English: Turning the world as if on a spit, the Doomgiver's anger spreads chaos and death through the city.
TEXT.French: Turning the world as if on a spit, the Doomgiver's anger spreads chaos and death through the city.
TEXT.German: Als wäre die Welt auf einen Spieß gebunden, hat der Verhängnisbringer in seiner Wut Tod und Choas in diese Stadt gebracht.
TEXT.Italian: Turning the world as if on a spit, the Doomgiver's anger spreads chaos and death through the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Turning the world as if on a spit, the Doomgiver's anger spreads chaos and death through the city.
